channel.title: So rep apparently does matter, a lot
channel.description:
I just did a 5 minute de-rep frenzy on everyone I could find until I got bored with it. [code]LilXCj (+10/-198) jGod (+10/-25) -1 - - mscp In topic September 14, 2011, 10:56:41 PM LilXCj (+10/-198) Gods army (+10/-118) -1 - - mscp In topic September 14, 2011, 10:56:36 PM LilXCj (+10/-198) Yz85Racer (+171/-199) -1 - - mscp In topic September 14, 2011, 10:56:30 PM LilXCj (+10/-198) The Wanderer (+10/-200) -1 0 - mscp In topic September 14, 2011, 10:55:47 PM LilXCj (+10/-198) jmood128 (+6/-199) -1 9 - mscp In topic September 14, 2011, 10:55:42 PM LilXCj (+10/-198) noobs are ftw (+25/-200) -1 0 In topic September 14, 2011, 10:55:35 PM LilXCj (+10/-198) Stupit (+10/-199) -1 9 - mscp In topic September 14, 2011, 10:55:23 PM LilXCj (+10/-198) reyx7 (+8/-200) -1 9 - mscp In topic September 14, 2011, 10:55:19 PM LilXCj (+10/-198) Ix Soulcist xI (+10/-200) -1 0 - mscp In topic September 14, 2011, 10:55:07 PM LilXCj (+10/-198) tinyscape (+10/-200) -1 0 - mscp In topic September 14, 2011, 10:54:59 PM LilXCj (+10/-198) lostmyphat (+10/-100) -1 0 - mscp In topic September 14, 2011, 10:54:54 PM LilXCj (+10/-198) John459 (+39/-198) -1 0 - mscp In topic September 14, 2011, 10:54:38 PM LilXCj (+10/-198) imsuperman05 (+10/-200) -1 0 - mscp In topic September 14, 2011, 10:54:33 PM LilXCj (+10/-198) xryz (+36/-144) -1 0 - mscp In topic September 14, 2011, 10:54:26 PM LilXCj (+10/-198) ziplock (+10/-200) -1 0 - mscp In topic September 14, 2011, 10:54:20 PM LilXCj (+10/-198) vortex (+57/-199) -1 0 - mscp In topic September 14, 2011, 10:54:14 PM LilXCj (+10/-198) Aetoc (+10/-10) -1 0 - mscp In topic September 14, 2011, 10:54:09 PM LilXCj (+10/-198) RiiPiiNFtW (+10/-73) -1 0 In topic September 14, 2011, 10:54:01 PM LilXCj (+10/-198) eballer48 (+10/-108) -1 0 - mscp In topic September 14, 2011, 10:53:56 PM LilXCj (+10/-198) mstcool 2 (+10/-6) -1 0 - mscp In topic September 14, 2011, 10:53:41 PM LilXCj (+10/-198) purestmage74 (+10/-28) -1 - - mscp In topic September 14, 2011, 10:53:28 PM LilXCj (+10/-198) Coder Eddie (+10/-34) -1 - - mscp In topic September 14, 2011, 10:53:23 PM LilXCj (+10/-198) Arkamys (+10/-10) -1 - - mscp In topic September 14, 2011, 10:53:18 PM[/code]
and when I came back from school today
[code]eballer48 (+10/-108) LilXCj (+10/-198) -1 I can do this too? - mscp In topic Today at 02:59:28 PM RiiPiiNFtW (+10/-73) LilXCj (+10/-198) -1 O - mscp In topic Today at 09:15:33 AM DannyC (+10/-74) LilXCj (+10/-198) 4 R u Need r 200 rep r rep back r? - mscp In topic Today at 06:12:34 AM noobs are ftw (+25/-200) LilXCj (+10/-198) -1 trololo In topic Today at 05:34:32 AM lostmyphat (+10/-100) LilXCj (+10/-198) -1 fag. - mscp In topic Today at 12:19:55 AM Coder Eddie (+10/-34) LilXCj (+10/-198) -1 -.- - mscp In topic September 14, 2011, 11:34:07 PM xmonster (+10/-10) LilXCj (+10/-198) -1 Don't rep abuse - mscp In topic September 14, 2011, 10:32:31 PM[/code]
Now, I'm not usually one to do that sort of thing but I wanted to see who actually pays attention to that silly number to the left and I tried to include as many people (except moderators) who seem to say "rep doesn't matter".
Now, I ask you, if it really doesn't matter, would you have --repped me for me --repping you for no actual reason? It seems silly that this community has turned rep into a 'If I has 10 or 200 rep I'm super cool!'
Can we have a legitimate discussion on how to fix this mind set with the community? inb4oldermoderatorsbelikecommunityistooimmaturetohandlerep
Maybe we just don't have enough strict control on who can ++ or --.
Notice that the people I derepped have gotten their 200 back already without them noticing.

item.title: So rep apparently does matter, a lot
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

I’m pretty sure doing this is what got Anthony’s rep reset the first time, then banned the second time?

Read full topic

item.title: So rep apparently does matter, a lot
item.dc:creator: @OmgItsShane Shane
item.description:
@OmgItsShane wrote:

[quote=“The Wanderer, post:51, topic:414788”][quote author=Frell link=topic=516749.msg3752302#msg3752302 date=1316131114]
I wanted only vets and mods, and those with 50+ rep to be able to rep. That would increase the value a fuck load and the people with over 50 knew how long it took for them to earn it and wouldnt give it out so easy.
[/quote]
This. Or replace with a thanks system where you couldn’t view how many thanks you have, but you could view who thanked which posts.[/quote]
We don’t want to be Rune Serber

Read full topic

item.title: So rep apparently does matter, a lot
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

I know this isn’t about posting your rep logs, But I think this is kind of what you mean how my rep worked.

Untamed Soul (+10/-10) krackkid (+10/-10) -1 How Do You Like That K Thanks - mscp In topic December 23, 2010, 05:17:36 PM Cole1497 (+14/-200) krackkid (+10/-10) 9 jeenyis. - mscp In topic December 23, 2010, 05:29:54 AM Mendorphins (+10/-200) krackkid (+10/-10) 13 +1 lol? - mscp In topic December 23, 2010, 05:15:57 AM xxlukexx (+10/-181) krackkid (+10/-10) -1 Please cry now :) - mscp In topic December 23, 2010, 05:14:47 AM shrogg (+19/-200) krackkid (+10/-10) 1 Cool In topic December 20, 2010, 10:59:24 PM Pblord7 (+10/-200) krackkid (+10/-10) 5 rawr In topic December 17, 2010, 01:37:03 PM noobs are ftw (+25/-199) krackkid (+10/-10) -1 I do but they dont In topic December 17, 2010, 01:29:15 PM Classic_ (+8/-200) krackkid (+10/-10) 8 Here. In topic December 17, 2010, 01:05:03 PM Infiniti (+10/-186) krackkid (+10/-10) -1 lol rep me down... rofl grow up kid - mscp In topic December 17, 2010, 12:36:14 PM nicks (+10/-59) krackkid (+10/-10) 1 to even you out to 200 lol - mscp In topic

When I lost rep, I got it back before even knowing I lost it.

Read full topic

item.title: So rep apparently does matter, a lot
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

[quote=“rip4d, post:36, topic:414788”][quote author=casey. link=topic=516749.msg3752290#msg3752290 date=1316130503]
remove it
[/quote][/quote]

Rep is just a stupid idea in the first place… Any number on this site can and will be used to measure ones knowledge… I say we remove them all, like make it not show. Who cares if you have over 2000 thousand posts? Who cares if you joined 3-4 years ago… The only thing that should matter on this site is that if you contribute to the community, whether that be in discussion or that be in releasing stuff.

Read full topic
item.source: So rep apparently does matter, a lot
